Html: It would be nice to have some simple samples, especially as you add more things to the toolkit....

To answer my own question there is a article I noticed this morning on CodeProject giving an example of the WPF Grid

http://www.codeproject.com/KB/WPF/WPFDataGrid.aspx

If you haven't seen Sam's video, you can check that out here, http://windowsclient.net/wpf/wpf35/wpf-video-datagrid-ctp-preview.aspx. 

I also wrote a short blog post with a pretty basic DataGrid sample here, http://blogs.msdn.com/vinsibal/archive/2008/08/11/net-3-5-sp1-and-wpf-datagrid-ctp-is-out-now.aspx.
